column4: I have a 1.4 GB movie file, that i need to move. But i only have a 1 GB USB stick. So i split the files using the 'split' command, but how do i put them back together again?
cat part1 part2 > completfile
and that will work even when it is not a text file?
try it :)
Okay ;b
should work as long as you get the order right ;-)
ah - should be cat part1 part2 >> completefile
two >> or it will clobber part1 with part2
Okay, thanks
Doesn't seem to work
It can play the 1st part of the movie, but the it just freezes
hmm
I am going to download HJSplit now
possibly it lacks some kind of header for part2
It might work
Thats what i thought... But when they are put together it shouldn't be a problem?
it *should* work - don't know why it doesn't
Well.... I wil just have to install HJSplit then :) thx anyway
I've done it with mp3s - but agmittedly there tended ro be a click between parts
Okay...
HJSplit installs fine on my laptop, but on the other computer it gives me errors when typing "make"
